Welcome to Ireaneus Linux Cheat Sheets webpage

Linux command line cheat sheets website

View on GitHub

Print all system information

uname -a

Linux system-hostname 3.2.0-4-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 3.2.32-1 x86_64 GNU/Linux

Print the hostname

uname -n

system-hostname

Print the kernel release

uname -r

3.2.0-4-amd64

Print the kernel version, with more specific information

uname -v

#1 SMP Debian 3.2.32-1

Print the hardware instruction set

uname -m

x86_64

Print the kernel name

uname -s

Linux

Print the operating system

uname -o

GNU/Linux
